law.catch_line: A person who submits a written refund claim for recordation tax that has been erroneously or mistake...
law.text: A person who submits a written refund claim for recordation tax that has been erroneously or mistakenly paid to or illegally or erroneously assessed or wrongfully collected by the clerk of a circuit court, the Director of Finance in Prince George's County, or the Department, or paid on property exempt wholly or partly from the recordation tax is eligible for a refund from the Department, clerk, or the Director of Finance that collected the recordation tax.
